channel.title: Posts on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on C'est la Z

item.title: First post again
item.description: The new site is live. I'm now running a Hugo based blog. I set it up using the Mainroad theme which seems to support everything I want. Out of the box Hugo supports org-mode with pretty much all of its niceties like: code highlighting org-mode structure (lists, tables) html can be directly embedded tags and categories The Mainroad theme added: MarthJax Analytics An easy menu widgets for the sidebar It was pretty easy to customize and deploying to GitHub pages is pretty simple.
